summary: Provides utilities for performing OCSP-based certificate revocation checks, including a checker class that determines revocation status using OpenSSL or the cryptography library, parses OCSP responses, verifies signatures, and discovers OCSP responder URLs.
business_intent: Enable Certbot to confirm that managed TLS certificates are still valid and not revoked before issuance or renewal, thereby maintaining secure and trustworthy HTTPS deployments.
